nmsEponOnuSerialPortTable.name: nmsEponOnuSerialPortTable
nmsEponOnuSerialPortTable.description: A list of epon ONU serial port table entries.

nmsEponOnuSerialPortEntry.name: nmsEponOnuSerialPortEntry
nmsEponOnuSerialPortEntry.description: A collection of additional objects in the epon ONU serial port table.

llidIfIndex.name: llidIfIndex
llidIfIndex.description: LLID interface id, unique in system. The same value as NMS-EPON-LLID mib index.

onuSerialPortSeqNo.name: onuSerialPortSeqNo
onuSerialPortSeqNo.description: ONU serial port sequence number, unique in one ONU.

onuSerialPortSpeed.name: onuSerialPortSpeed
onuSerialPortSpeed.description: ONU serial port speed. Default value is 9600.

onuSerialPortDataBits.name: onuSerialPortDataBits
onuSerialPortDataBits.description: ONU serial port data bits. Default value is 8.

onuSerialPortHaltBits.name: onuSerialPortHaltBits
onuSerialPortHaltBits.description: ONU serial port halt bits. Default value is 1.

onuSerialPortParity.name: onuSerialPortParity
onuSerialPortParity.description: ONU serial port parity. Default value is 0-none.

onuSerialPortFlowControl.name: onuSerialPortFlowControl
onuSerialPortFlowControl.description: ONU serial port parity. Default value is 0-none.

onuSerialPortPropRowStatus.name: onuSerialPortPropRowStatus
onuSerialPortPropRowStatus.description: ONU serial port properties row status.These five item are set together: onuSerialPortSpeed, onuSerialPortDataBits, onuSerialPortHaltBits, onuSerialPortParity, onuSerialPortFlowControl.

onuSerialPortDataReadInterval.name: onuSerialPortDataReadInterval
onuSerialPortDataReadInterval.description: ONU serial port buffer data read interval. Unit is mili-second, and default value is 100 ms.

onuSerialPortDataReadBytes.name: onuSerialPortDataReadBytes
onuSerialPortDataReadBytes.description: ONU serial port buffer data read bytes. When storage is up to limit, the bytes must be sent out. Default value is 100.

onuSerialPortBufferRowStatus.name: onuSerialPortBufferRowStatus
onuSerialPortBufferRowStatus.description: ONU serial port buffer setting row status.These two item are set together: onuSerialPortDataReadInterval, onuSerialPortDataReadBytes.

onuSerialPortKeepaliveIdle.name: onuSerialPortKeepaliveIdle
onuSerialPortKeepaliveIdle.description: ONU serial port keepalive idle. if there is no r/x package in time of onuSerialPortKeepaliveIdle, system will send keepalive package to probe. Unit is second, and default value is 100 s.

onuSerialPortKeepaliveTimeout.name: onuSerialPortKeepaliveTimeout
onuSerialPortKeepaliveTimeout.description: ONU serial port keepalive timeout. if there is no r/x package in time of onuSerialPortKeepaliveIdle, system will send keepalive package to probe. And if there is no rsponse package in onuSerialPortKeepaliveTimeout, this keepalive package is timeout. Unit is second, and default value is 100 s.

onuSerialPortKeepaliveProbeCount.name: onuSerialPortKeepaliveProbeCount
onuSerialPortKeepaliveProbeCount.description: ONU serial port keepalive probing package sending count. Default value is 3.

onuSerialPortKeepaliveRowStatus.name: onuSerialPortKeepaliveRowStatus
onuSerialPortKeepaliveRowStatus.description: ONU serial port keepalive setting value row status. These three items are set together: onuSerialPortKeepaliveIdle, onuSerialPortKeepaliveTimeout, onuSerialPortKeepaliveProbeCount.
